survey.title: Testing your understanding of video elements

questions.name: title
questions.html: Please answer following questions. You will be disqualified from the study if you get more than one questions wrong.

questions.name: vet1
questions.title: Which of the following is the correct definition for: Video resolution?
choices: (A) How smooth the visuals in a video are.
(B) How well the visuals in the video match with the sound.
(C) Whether the audio sounds choppy or fluent.
(D) How clear or crisp the visuals are in the video.
(E) How clear or crisp the audio sounds.

questions.name: vet2
questions.title: Which of the following is the correct definition for: Audio quality?
choices: (A) How smooth the visuals in a video are.
(B) How well the visuals in the video match with the sound.
(C) Whether the audio sounds choppy or fluent.
(D) How clear or crisp the visuals are in the video.
(E) How clear or crisp the audio sounds.

questions.name: vet3
questions.title: Which of the following is the correct definition for: Motion smoothness?
choices: (A) How smooth the visuals in a video are.
(B) How well the visuals in the video match with the sound.
(C) Whether the audio sounds choppy or fluent.
(D) How clear or crisp the visuals are in the video.
(E) How clear or crisp the audio sounds.

questions.name: vet4
questions.title: Which of the following is the correct definition for: Audio stability?
choices: (A) How smooth the visuals in a video are.
(B) How well the visuals in the video match with the sound.
(C) Whether the audio sounds choppy or fluent.
(D) How clear or crisp the visuals are in the video.
(E) How clear or crisp the audio sounds.

questions.name: vet5
questions.title: Which of the following is the correct definition for: Audio-video synchronization?
choices: (A) How smooth the visuals in a video are.
(B) How well the visuals in the video match with the sound.
(C) Whether the audio sounds choppy or fluent.
(D) How clear or crisp the visuals are in the video.
(E) How clear or crisp the audio sounds.

questions.name: vet6
questions.title: What is the object that fell and hit the butterfly in the example videos?
choices: (1) A Banana
(2) A Stone
(3) An Apple
(4) A Flower
